snippet.title: Love Live! School Idol Festival ~after school ACTIVITY~ Wai-Wai!Home Meeting!! - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Coming to PlayStation 4!
A rhythm game in which you can enjoy live performances from μ's, Aqours, and Saint Snow on a big screen! 
Have a blast and enjoy the game at home♪

Official website: https://lovelive-sifachm.square-enix-games.com/ 
Official Twitter account: https://twitter.com/lovelive_staff 

#LoveLive #PS4
